values.en: used to emphasize that sth is correct in every way or in every detail

values.cn: （要求得到更多信息）究竟，到底
values.en: used to ask for more information about sth

values.cn: （答语，表示赞同或强调正确）一点不错，正是如此，完全正确
values.en: used as a reply, agreeing with what sb has just said, or emphasizing that it is correct

sentences.en: Callum: Exactly. And that's what the word used to mean, but now it refers to a rude and violent man, often a young man but not always.
sentences.cn: 对极了！这个单词过去就是“男孩”的意思，但是现在用来指粗鲁粗俗的男人了，通常是指年轻人但有时候也不一定。

sentences.en: Exactly! And finally, waiting is often a physical thing. We often stand or sit somewhere until something happens.
sentences.cn: 我们通常是站着、坐着或是徘徊着等待一件事情发生，或某人出现。

sentences.en: In this system, analysts say, Mr. Zhou's role is akin to that of an economic adviser a position not exactly on par with Ms. Clinton's.
sentences.cn: 分析师们说，在这样一个体系中，周小川的角色相当于经济顾问，而这样的地位并不能跟克林顿相比。

sentences.en: Heather: This apartment is exactly what I'm looking for. How much is the rent?
sentences.cn: 黑仁：这就是我想要找的房子。租金是多少？

sentences.en: I thought about how strange it was that he had two legs, two arms, one head, etc. , almost exactly like a regular human being.
sentences.cn: 他居然是两手两脚，一个脑袋…..看上去还是象人类。

sentences.en: 'Here, the suppliers have no idea what you're talking about, so you're trying to find out what, exactly, is in a particular wooden board. '
sentences.cn: 但是在这里，供应商根本不知道LEED是什么，因此你必须想办法弄清楚他们卖的木质板材里面到底用了哪些材料。

sentences.en: You impetuous little whelp. . . I know exactly what you and the mortal are up to. Are you ready to die, dragon?
sentences.cn: 你这个急躁的小虫子，我完全知道你和那个凡人在搞什麽鬼，你准备接受死亡了吗，红龙？

sentences.en: However, the security defaults should not be modified unless you know exactly what you are doing.
sentences.cn: 但是，除非您知道修改默认安全设置的后果，否则请不要修改。

sentences.en: 'Absolutely, ' said Dr. Leffell, who noted that someday personalized medicine may be able to predict exactly who can bask in the sun safely.
sentences.cn: 答：“绝对有差异”，莱费尔博士说。他指出，终有一天，个性化医学将能准确预测谁可以安全地沐浴在阳光下。

sentences.en: She oftentimes knows what I'm going to say even before I do, and most of the time she knows exactly when not to say anything to me at all.
sentences.cn: 通常，我还没开口她就知道我要说什么了；而且，在我不想和人答腔的时候，她都能感受到，并做到缄口不言。
